authorAttribution.displayName: Healthy and Joyful Living with Dr. Juan Paredes

originalText.text:
I want to share a wonder experience with Jose, the manager for J. Automatic Appliance Parts; I reside in Miami and here, we could not get any reliable service to get some parts for my "kitchen Aid Stove".
We went on vacation to Mid Town New York and one of the side trips were to get the broken knobs; after a wonderful subway ride to the San Nicolas Subway Station, we walked four blocks to find the place.
Mr Jose was knowledgable and pleasant;  he ordered the right parts and 10 days later we received them in Miami.
Now, we are back to fully enjoy our Stove thanks to J. Automatic Appliance Parts.

Thank you!

originalText.text: I needed manufacturer parts for my DCS Gas Range. My Super suggested I get them from J Automatic. The service was great, I received the parts we needed promptly and I really appreciated their integrity and follow-up. If you need appliance parts, these are the ones to trust!

text.text: I needed manufacturer parts for my DCS Gas Range. My Super suggested I get them from J Automatic. The service was great, I received the parts we needed promptly and I really appreciated their integrity and follow-up. If you need appliance parts, these are the ones to trust!

originalText.text: My refrigerator is on a Fritz.  Didn't get his name because I was concerned about my double parked car.  He was very helpful explain possible solutions.  Very knowledgeable.  Parking SUCKS. Come with an extra driver.
